summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement for ingress, egress and underground utilities over the City of Seattle, City Light Department's fee-owned Skagit Transmission Line Right-of-Way in Government Lot 2, Section 14, Township 35 North, Range 10 East, W.M., in Skagit County, Washington and consenting to the continuation of the ingress, egress and underground utilities easement over the City's adjoining easement right-of-way (P.M. \#351014-1-301)
